nodes.text: T'mott Zoat was a male Shistavanen criminal who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In 41 BBY, Obi-Wan Kenobi was charged with protecting a woman named Jesef on the planet of Helleguth. Kenobi failed, and T'mott Zoat killed the woman. Twenty years later, while on leave on the planet of Wielu, Kenobi saw Zoat while relaxing on the beach. He gave chase but Zoat was able to evade Kenobi, until the smuggler Rook Pryce tripped Zoat. Pryce then offered to take Kenobi to Helleguth, but Pryce released his prisoner after Zoat bribed him. Later, Kenobi captured Zoat despite Pryce betraying Kenobi.
